name: Queens Cup
description:
Made in 48 hours by a team of local developers, Quack Studios presents: Queen's Cup!

A spin on the drinking game "King's Cup", Queen's Cup is a drinking game turned video game, where players can load up the game and be the life of the party with different prompts for each card, and variations on those prompts. Queen's Cup can be played on Windows and Android devices.

Please drink responsibly!
Ages 21 and up.
